name: Something, Something, Spacegame
description:
Something, Something Spaceships! is a local multiplayer, 2-4 player gravity explosion fest! You control a spaceship with the use of only one key (which allows for up to four players to be on one keyboard at the same time) The goal is simple: use your bullets to destroy your opponents spaceships and be the last ship standing. The first spacecraft to win five rounds is the winner!

The game only requires one key to control your spacecraft and the controls are configured in the menus. Additionally you can use the escape key to exit to the main menu. For enhanced performance; download the standalone PC-build.
